name: For SquareUP
query:
select
`tabGL Entry`.posting_date as "Posting Date:Date:100",
`tabGL Entry`.account as "Account:200",
`tabGL Entry`.debit as "Debit:100",
`tabGL Entry`.credit as "Credit:100",
(@rbal := @rbal - `tabGL Entry`.credit + `tabGL Entry`.debit) as "Running Total:Float:100",
`tabGL Entry`.voucher_type as "Voucher Type:100",
`tabGL Entry`.voucher_no as "Voucher Number:100",
`tabGL Entry`.remarks as "Remarks:120",
`tabGL Entry`.against as "Against Account:120"
from
`tabGL Entry`
JOIN (select @rbal := 0) B
where
`tabGL Entry`.account = "SquareUp - SF"
order by
`tabGL Entry`.posting_date ASC
